kineticMonteCarlo.atom

Class GrapheneAtomGaillardSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • kineticMonteCarlo.atom.AbstractAtom
      • kineticMonteCarlo.atom.AbstractGrowthAtom
        • kineticMonteCarlo.atom.GrapheneAtom
          • kineticMonteCarlo.atom.GrapheneAtomGaillardSimple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, IAtom, IElement

    public class GrapheneAtomGaillardSimple
extends GrapheneAtom
    Based on paper P. Gaillard, T. Chanier, L. Henrard, P. Moskovkin, S. Lucas. Surface Science, Volumes 637–638, July–August 2015, Pages 11-18, http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.susc.2015.02.014.
    Author:
    J. Alberdi-Rodriguez

      • isEligible

        public boolean isEligible()
        Only BULK atom types are considered immobile atoms. From page 15 of the paper.
        Specified by:
        isEligible in interface IAtom
        Overrides:
        isEligible in class GrapheneAtom
        Returns:
        true if current atom can be moved, false otherwise.

      • getTypeWithoutNeighbour

        public byte getTypeWithoutNeighbour(int position)
        Returns the type of the neighbour atom if current one would not exist. Essentially, it has one less neighbour.
        Overrides:
        getTypeWithoutNeighbour in class GrapheneAtom
        Parameters:
        position - ignored.
        Returns:
        the type.

      • getNewType

        public byte getNewType(int neighbourPosition,
                       int addOrRemove)
        Calculates the new atom type when adding or removing a neighbour.
        Overrides:
        getNewType in class GrapheneAtom
        Parameters:
        neighbourPosition - position of the neighbour. Must be always 1. Ignored
        addOrRemove - add or remove one neighbour. Must be -1 or 1
        Returns:
        new atom type
